mmud.database.enums

Enum Alignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Alignment>
      • mmud.database.enums.Alignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Alignment>

    public enum Alignment
extends java.lang.Enum<Alignment>
    Indicates how drunk you are, or how thirsty.

        public static java.lang.Integer max()

      • getAlignment

        public static Alignment getAlignment(java.lang.Integer alignment)
        Returns the thirstiness of the character. Must be a number between -5999 and 5999, where -5999..-5000 is out of your skull on alcohol and 5000..5999 is no longer able to drink.
        Returns:
        Alignment enum.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the movement is not allowed
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if movement not provided

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()

        Returns:
        for example "mean"

        Returns the integer indicating the alignment.
        Returns:
        integer
